name: Balls and Balls and MORE BALLS [DEMO]
name_original: Balls and Balls and MORE BALLS [DEMO]
description:
I haven't put a control tutorial for the Player 2.  So, here it is :

Left/Right arrows = Move Left/Right

Up/Down arrows = Move Up/Down

Right Shift = Jump

Just a reminder, this is the DEMO version. It is still in its early days. So please, give respect because I put some much time into this even though I'm a lazy person. I appreciate anyone who played this, no matter they hate it or not, you still spend time on my game. Thank you.
